__TOC__


Here we have a sampling of bugs to work on for Hug Day.  After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after "background-color:" and before ";".  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.  A potentially easier way to do this was <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-bugsquad/2007-November/000666.html|mailed]]</nowiki> to the Bug Squad.

For more information about debugging printing problems and the information to gather please see DebuggingPrintingProblems.  Additionally, if you learn anything about debugging printing please share it with the team by updating that wiki page!

=== 105 New bugs regarding cupsys ===
Description of what kind of bugs they are and how people can find more.

'''To mark it off the list you should:'''
* Ask for more information, see DebuggingPrintingProblems for details, change the bug's status to "Incomplete" and subscribe yourself '''or'''
* If the bug contains the minimum information required for a printing bug or you can confirm it set the bug's status to "Confirmed" '''or'''
* If the bug really seems to be a support question convert it to a question but get a second opinion from a team mate
